name: phrase-api-reference
description: Phrase is a translation management platform for software projects. You can collaborate on language file translation with your team or order translations through our platform.

scripts.start: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && npm run -s generate && echo "Clients library genrated, check clients directory."
scripts.generate.ruby: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/ruby_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.go: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/go_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.php: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/php_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.typescript: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/typescript_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.python: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/python_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.java: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/java_lang.yaml
scripts.generate.swift4: npm run -s lint && npm run -s bundle && openapi-generator batch openapi-generator/swift4_lang.yaml
